website_summaries.verdict: If you're expecting a harsh winter, this is the machine you want in your garage.
pros: Can clear huge amounts of snow in conditions that would, quite literally, choke many competitors
cons: One of the more expensive machines on the market, but you definitely get what you pay for

customer_reviews.title: Cable snapped after 4 uses!
customer_reviews.text: We purchased this snowblower 3 months ago and it's already broken.We used it 4 times and the gear shift cable snapped. We had to pay to have it picked up to assess whether the problem will be covered under warranty. Fingers crossed it's covered,as it should be! What a hassle! And we have another storm on the way.
customer_reviews.author: John Doody

customer_reviews.title: This is the second time that this product has been ...
customer_reviews.text: This is the second time that this product has been delivered and turned out to be defective. This time I had 2 bolts fold out from the main carriage and then an additional fell out on the blades. I guess on line works for some products but not this one. Would appear that Amazon needs to improve their vendor selection.
customer_reviews.author: Mark Cross

customer_reviews.title: Reverse TOO SLOW.
customer_reviews.text: I bought this snowblower to replace a 1972 Ariens 7HP 24" blower that I bought new, and still use today. Although the Husqvarna is brand new and all the controls are mounted by my hands, I like my old Ariens better. I live in Vermont and we have a LOT of snow. The Husqvarna is underpowered for a 24" auger, unless the snow is very light. My biggest complaint is that REVERSE is really SLOW. As a result, I usually have to drag the machine backwards manually which is a pain. However, for the price I paid it is not a bad machine so far.
customer_reviews.author: Conrad Lanoue

customer_reviews.title: ... lot to compare it to but It does a great job. This is my third season with this ...
customer_reviews.text: This is my first snowblower I’ve owned so I don’t have a lot to compare it to but It does a great job. This is my third season with this blower and I do about 15 driveways every time it snows. I had to replace the Auger belt which I shredded up because of a lot of use and my hand warmers never worked, but other than that I can’t complan. Great machine 🤙🏼
customer_reviews.author: Cool breeze

customer_reviews.title: Really Makes the Snow Fly!
customer_reviews.text: Our old snowblower hit the skids, right when we needed it the most. We read the reviews, and decided to order this one. I'm shocked how far the show blows out of this chute! It was like night and day compared to our old one. It starts up easily, even in 20 below zero weather, and does a fantastic job. Delivery was much quicker than expected. My husband is a big fan of Husqvarna products. This snowblower did not disappoint!
customer_reviews.author: JannyP

customer_reviews.title: Bad cable holders/ good blower
customer_reviews.text: Belt and or pulley are noisy. The cable holders where both broke and also the one on the side on the handle bare . The blower works really good.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Fan belt issues...
customer_reviews.text: Fan belt broke during the second season of light use. Had to replace it myself and noticed that the piece the belt rests on is bent which caused it to get rubbed on and break. Not sure how I'm supposed to fix that completely...Bent it back as much as I could. It's a good blower, just having that issue.
customer_reviews.author: Drew-K

customer_reviews.title: My neighbors got lazy.
customer_reviews.text: I was leery about ordering something this big through Amazon but was not disappointed. It worked great for the long winter we had. The only problem I had was that my garage is in a dead end alley and when my neighbors saw that I got this snowblower they got lazy. It did make clearing the alley a breeze.
customer_reviews.author: nowufny2

customer_reviews.title: Great thrower for wet/heavy and deep snow
customer_reviews.text: It is a powerful snow thrower that handles deep and heavy/wet snow quite easily. The self propel forward, even at the lowest speed, is pretty fast (my husband turns it on and off as he goes), and the reverse speed is *extremely* slow. We have not tried out the heated handles or headlights yet to comment on those. Overall seems to be a good machine after two uses.
customer_reviews.author: Mandy R

customer_reviews.title: Powerful machine
customer_reviews.text: This is one strong snowblower. Works well in anything from 3" to 12" of heavy snow. Very strong, took a bit to get used to the power in turns. Starts easily, cleans snow nicely. Heated handles and light is a nice option.
customer_reviews.author: Plainman

customer_reviews.title: Poor shipping service
customer_reviews.text: Minus three stars for the shipping service, arrived with the top of the box torn open with two pieces of tape loosely placed over it to try to close it up again. I opened it up and everything looked ok, until I started assembly. I noticed it's missing a wing nut that holds up the handle, lost during shipment I assume. I also noticed it's got a large scratch across the crossbar where the controls are attached. Other than that it did fire right up and everything seems to be working, will update once we get some snow here.
customer_reviews.author: Jim Lancaste

customer_reviews.title: Never have any issues
customer_reviews.text: So I finally got some snow in Minnesota, it was about 4 inches of snow with a lot of rain. So it was heavy. I put that thing in 3rd gear and it did a really good job. At the end of the driveway I had to use 2nd gear, the hand warmer are not super impressive but then again it wasn't really that cold. I would buy it again. Oh it never plugged.
customer_reviews.author: Luc

customer_reviews.title: I don't use it much but when I do, ...
customer_reviews.text: I don't use it much but when I do, I can't rely on it. It constantly stalls, and my drive cable snapped on second use. It's my only white elephant purchase in my tool shed.
customer_reviews.author: Jakers

customer_reviews.title: Love this snowblower
customer_reviews.text: Love this snowblower. Easy to assemble and started right up. We have had some pretty heavy snow and this machine walks right through the deepest and heaviest snow. This is my 4th Husqvarna product and they all continue not to disappoint.
customer_reviews.author: Hugh

customer_reviews.title: Runs perfect. Was concerned that it was transported upside down ...
customer_reviews.text: Used once since purchased. This was thought to be lost in shipping but turned out it wasn't. Runs perfect. Was concerned that it was transported upside down with oil in it but after sitting for a bit it started right up with no problems. Now waiting for snow to use it again.
customer_reviews.author: David J

customer_reviews.title: Exceptional quality, best blower I've owned
customer_reviews.text: Best machine yet ! What a blower ! 100% guaranteed this is the blower you want. I have ran mine 2x already and have 0 issues in snow up to 9" so far. I really don't like running in more than average to keep the machines life. This thing throws snow up to 25' away. Great design, great controls, great quality product. I'm happy to answer any questions anyone has about this unit you can't go wrong buying quality.
customer_reviews.author: Thomas M.

customer_reviews.title: Throws the heavy snow
customer_reviews.text: Works well with heavy snow. It is not easy for a smaller person to use, but it will throw the heavy snow that single stage machines struggle with. I like the plug in electric start, very smart, saves you from ever needing to replace the battery. However, the pull start is very easy to use.
customer_reviews.author: LoveIt

customer_reviews.title: piece of junk
customer_reviews.text: This thing has never run right, and you have to empty all the gas out after each use, and put in fuel cleaner each time, even then it still runs crappy and backfires. I have a 20 year old lawn mower, I have never emptied the gas from it or used stabliizer, it starts every time, paid $150 for it in 1998.. yard boy....this thing is an $850 piece of junk, want to buy mine?
customer_reviews.author: joelio

customer_reviews.title: easy to assemble
customer_reviews.text: easy to assemble. and started with one push to the electric start button, However, I only used it twice in March, having only one heavy snow storm 12 to 14 inches. next year will be the big test but for now I'm happy with the machine.
customer_reviews.author: M. Kalweit

customer_reviews.title: We sure were glad we got it in time and no troube starting ...
customer_reviews.text: My husband just used it the last couple of days for our last storm in the Boston area. He said it had more power than our last blower and threw the snow further. We sure were glad we got it in time and no troube starting it even with this frigid weather.
customer_reviews.author: Margaret Stanton

customer_reviews.title: This snow blower got a good workout last winter
customer_reviews.text: This snow blower got a good workout last winter. It easily clears deep heavy snow and throws it a good distance away. I also love the heated hand grips. If your shopping for a 24 inch snow blower, I recommend this one.
customer_reviews.author: WingNutWilly

customer_reviews.title: It starts easily, both with the pull handle and the electric ...
customer_reviews.text: Works very well. It starts easily, both with the pull handle and the electric start. The light illuminates what you are doing nicely and the heated hand grips make prolonged work much more pleasant.
customer_reviews.author: Bryan Adams

customer_reviews.title: Husqvarna ST224 24-inch 208cc Two Stage Snow Blower
customer_reviews.text: Easy to put together, it weighs around 240 lbs when delivered. It does not work with wet snow, it plugs up and stalls. Does well with dry snow, easy electric start up.
customer_reviews.author: TAnijar

customer_reviews.title: Blows through the competition
customer_reviews.text: After receiving over 7 inches of snow recently, this Husqvarna blew through it with effortless, ease. It is powerful, agile, and maneuvers quite well. The only minor complain is that it seemed like a gas guzzler.
customer_reviews.author: Go Greener

customer_reviews.title: I especially like the elective start feature
customer_reviews.text: I used this snow thrower for the first time last night and was impressed. Yes, I was only clearing about 3" of snow, but it was very wet, and the machine was able to cleanly remove it, and throw it an appropriate distance with not trouble. I especially like the elective start feature: Simply plug in an extension cord, start and unplug. No batteries to deal with is a real plus. (Yes, it has a starter cord for starting away from electricity. We're expecting a major blizzard tomorrow with 1-2 feet of snow predicted. That will really put this baby to the test, but I am confident it will perform like the professional machine that it is.
customer_reviews.author: Riverdale Fine Furniture

customer_reviews.title: Snowblower
customer_reviews.text: Everything was as it should be, from delivery to a excellent product.
customer_reviews.author: jerome talbot

customer_reviews.title: Well packaged, easy to assemble.
customer_reviews.text: Started on the second pull after a well laid out written and diagramed assembly were followed, and gas and oil added. Won't know of its performance until after a few uses. Lack of a setting to tilt the chute seems odd.
customer_reviews.author: Kevin Kliber

customer_reviews.title: Manufacturing defects
customer_reviews.text: I taught it s good until trying out first time smoking smell idle up and down not the machine i want
customer_reviews.author: phamnguyen

customer_reviews.title: Quality
customer_reviews.text: My husband bought this for use of snow removal and it does the job well and is easy to use.
customer_reviews.author: Linda Geer

customer_reviews.title: Awesome purchase and price
customer_reviews.text: Awesome purchase and price. Using this winter and it works great. Broke the first tension bolt yesterday - easy to replace (2 minutes). Works very well. Note it is a large blower with a wider turn radius - meaning, it is not as easy as the small ones to whip around at the end of the drive --- but very doable. Enjoy!
customer_reviews.author: CS

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: A super unit for moving snow. After the big snow storm today, clearing the driveway is a breeze.
customer_reviews.author: Lee

customer_reviews.title: ... times since i bought it (i guess that's a good thing). it works as advertised
customer_reviews.text: i've only got to use this a few times since i bought it (i guess that's a good thing). it works as advertised, easy to start, steer, and change gears. overall, i'm very pleased with it
customer_reviews.author: IT Chief

customer_reviews.title: No complaints. Moves heavy snow with ease. Starts ...
customer_reviews.text: No complaints. Moves heavy snow with ease. Starts on the first pull.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great snowblower! Used in quite a few different storms ...
customer_reviews.text: Great snowblower! Used in quite a few different storms in the Boston area. It’s been a life saver! Fast! Easy to start and just works!
customer_reviews.author: Mike

customer_reviews.title: Won’t start after 1 season of using
customer_reviews.text: I’ve used this machine for 1 year. It will not start. I just had to shovel 8 inches by hand while staring at this broken machine. New gas and won’t start. This should not happen with a new machine. I want a refund, amazon.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: ... new Husqvarna handled my 2 feet deep icy snow nicely. I couldn't be more pleased
customer_reviews.text: My new Husqvarna handled my 2 feet deep icy snow nicely. I couldn't be more pleased. This is a great snow thrower .
customer_reviews.author: Robert E. Sorenson

customer_reviews.title: this is awesome! Sent in crate and delivered to my house
customer_reviews.text: Holy Cow, this is awesome! Sent in crate and delivered to my house. Great process.
customer_reviews.author: Stephen Devenport

customer_reviews.title: Looks Pretty, Terrible To Keep Running
customer_reviews.text: Terrible after a few months, two control cables broke....ugh... Motor is fine but do you really want cables that break because it's too cold? Last use in snow broke some more. I now have it at the dealer for a overhaul. I am going to sell it and buy a more reliable one. I live in Southern CO and the snow is usually powdery so its not like Minnesota or Wisconsin where its deep heavy snow. All the plastic seems to break in the cold weather.
customer_reviews.author: R.Longfellow

customer_reviews.title: This is a tank! Goes up against any amount ...
customer_reviews.text: This is a tank! Goes up against any amount of snow.
customer_reviews.author: Terry

customer_reviews.title: Very pleased. We have a long drive and weather in ...
customer_reviews.text: Very pleased. We have a long drive and weather in New Jersey can be brutal. Were concerned that we should have got the more powerful version but this has been perfectly good.
customer_reviews.author: John D.

customer_reviews.title: great product
customer_reviews.text: I use this product for snow removal around the home. This product is well made, everything works well and a very efficient machine. I would buy it again.
customer_reviews.author: Lorie C

customer_reviews.title: Nice good price
customer_reviews.text: Nice good price. I did a path to the shed in 18 inches of snow and it did it with ease.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Smart layout of controls, well designed.
customer_reviews.text: Does the job well, with the added plus of heated grips. All controls are easy to use and in the right place,
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: It is truly a nice working machine
customer_reviews.text: It is truly a nice working machine. It's easy to handle and it does a great job as I guide it thru the snow
customer_reviews.author: Patricia Miller

customer_reviews.title: Damaged, Leaks Gas... Regrets!
customer_reviews.text: I bought this Feb 1st. It came in all damaged.. the console is all slanted, wing nuts missing or cracked, bolts slanted.. every time I use it it leaks gas all over my driveway. Not happy! I wish I would have gone to a local home depot or Lowes.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: The best snow blower I have ever owned
customer_reviews.text: The best snow blower I have ever owned. Feature rich and really well built. If my neighbor who now loves it, steals it, I will buy it again!
customer_reviews.author: William E. Steele

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: My husband absolutely loves it. Wish it came with a place to 'stand' on it....it really moves itself.
customer_reviews.author: deb

customer_reviews.title: great machine but gives me Hot Hands.
customer_reviews.text: two storms in and its was amazing! The only complaint is that I keep turning the hand warmers on by accident.
customer_reviews.author: KTW

customer_reviews.title: Best snowblower for the money
customer_reviews.text: Easy to assemble - just add snow! Started on the 1st pull, can't wait to use it and give an update
customer_reviews.author: Douglas Clark

customer_reviews.title: Works great in the deep snow
customer_reviews.text: Used in the Boston Blizzard of 2015. Works great in the deep snow!
customer_reviews.author: Informed Consumer

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: beautiful machine way way better than toro and such costing as much if not more than
customer_reviews.author: robin cannon

customer_reviews.title: Took a while to get it but it was a very good purchase
customer_reviews.text: Best thing I ever did was buy a snowblower thank you
customer_reviews.author: Bill sturdevant

customer_reviews.title: Easy assembly
customer_reviews.text: Not too difficult to put together. It does what it's supposed to do.
customer_reviews.author: Shaun Lindenberger

customer_reviews.title: Awesome
customer_reviews.text: Awesome machine, lights didn't work right out of the box. I still think it is awesome. Very powerful and moves even the deepest snow. Hand warmers are great!
customer_reviews.author: Dustin W Allen

customer_reviews.title: Great
customer_reviews.text: Just what I needed like my own snow insurance policy
customer_reviews.author: Frank DiGennaro

customer_reviews.title: let it snow !!!
customer_reviews.text: I did 7driveways after our last snowstorm. I was happy...and so were my neighbors.
customer_reviews.author: John Armstrong

customer_reviews.title: Great machine
customer_reviews.text: This machine works great moves the snow with no effort starts right up and the heated hand warmers are sweet
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Good blower for a strapping lad to hump around!
customer_reviews.text: Pros: It's HUGE Cons: It's HUGE Seriously... I'm 5' in my stocking feet (and 110lbs) and this is a large piece of machinery to be lugging around without power steering (note to self for next blower...). However, it does the job well and starts first time, every time with the pull start. I've never used the electric start.
customer_reviews.author: Vikster

customer_reviews.title: Directional Chute problem
customer_reviews.text: The directional chute will only rotate from center to the left side . It will not rotate to the right. I installed it exactly as shown and directed in the instructions. Also the plastic clip that holds the tool for unclogging the auger is broken in half. The chute problem renders this brand new machine almost useless. Not happy. Help JFrang Enfield CT
customer_reviews.author: joeflash

customer_reviews.title: I really like this snow blower which works exactly as I imagined ...
customer_reviews.text: I really like this snow blower which works exactly as I imagined it would. My only problem has been in adjusting the chute to fully swivel both to the right and left--which, of course, is a problem.
customer_reviews.author: Liz Crosby

customer_reviews.title: I recommend getting an extra drive belt for the impeller
customer_reviews.text: Works well, throws snow 25 feet. Had the ST224 for 2 seasons so far, and it has always done the job. No real need for the handle heaters. Assembly was pretty simple. When ordering this, I recommend getting an extra drive belt for the impeller. Mine snapped in the middle of a job and no local stores had the right size, very inconvenient. Ended up ordering belt direct from Husqvarna, couldn’t find it anywhere else.
customer_reviews.author: Peter Biddle

customer_reviews.title: Awesome.
customer_reviews.text: Bought mine from Amazon a year ago. Delivery was smooth and easy. Machine did great on 2-4 inches of snow the first year. I was anxious to use it so I never really let the snow pile up. Today's blizzard in the northeast I woke up to 8". Machine laughed at it. Cut straight through. I had it buried in piles just running the blades and it was throwing snow 15 feet. I'll be buying more husqvarna equipment moving forward. Spent a little more than I wanted too and it was worth it. 100% satisfied w machine and delivery and financing through Amazon.
customer_reviews.author: Brian Werling

customer_reviews.title: Want a real snowblower.....this one is great.
customer_reviews.text: Wow....record snowfall in New York, 27 inches. This machine was like a hot knife through butter. It was brand new and ready to go. We added gas and on the slightest pull the engine roared to life. No complaints really. Reverse is a little too slow but that is common. Forward speed can really get this machine moving. Good deal for the money. Also, delivery was great and timely.
customer_reviews.author: Anne L. Bilms

customer_reviews.title: Rugged Snow Thrower!
customer_reviews.text: This is a beautiful machine. I have to begin by saying that I have yet to move snow with it yet however it was packaged very well and very easy to assemble. Started right up and feels very solid. I'm not looking forward to snow next year but I will know that I have a powerful machine to move it!
customer_reviews.author: tewitt1014

customer_reviews.title: ... Owner's Manual with the snow thrower would have been great. I had to find and download a copy ...
customer_reviews.text: An Owner's Manual with the snow thrower would have been great. I had to find and download a copy on my own. Some very important information reference to assembling the unit was not clear with the snow blower. Additionally, the snow chute is not steady while throwing the snow.
customer_reviews.author: Linda Tafua

customer_reviews.title: Can't wait to use!
customer_reviews.text: Minor damage was present to the outer box, but the blower is packaged very well. It is strapped down to a pallet and is very secure. Assembly is easy, although one of the nuts to hold the tension cord for the shute was the wrong size. Snow blower starts right up and am very excited to start using it!
customer_reviews.author: J. Hall

customer_reviews.title: LOVE this machine
customer_reviews.text: LOVE this machine. I am a 58 year old woman and can handle this with ease... I have longish driveway and I just didn't want to shovel it anymore! This baby is self propelled and has an electric start... Two must haves for me. I couldn't bear to go cheap on this purchase. The 2 belts are easy to change. It's sooo awesome and I feel like a Hot #@*% using it. I live in CT and this sweet thing has made my life MUCH easier. The guys on my street want to date me now!!! And I thought the anti-wrinkle creams would do the trick... Go figure!
customer_reviews.author: Lady Harper

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Excellent snow blower. If you need a snow blower buy this one. you won't be sorry.
customer_reviews.author: G. Allen

customer_reviews.title: Had to use 4 times in the first month and happy every time
customer_reviews.text: Took little time to assemble, and runs perfectly and moved the snow. Had to use 4 times in the first month and happy every time. So easy to use wife my is going to use.
customer_reviews.author: Brad Lewandowski

customer_reviews.title: I bought this based on the reviews and ordered sadly ...
customer_reviews.text: I bought this based on the reviews and ordered sadly after 30 inches of snow fell. This was packed well and from unboxing to turning on was 15-20 minutes. I took one pull for it to turn on and it worked well for the icy snow. I hardest item was figuring out it had heated handles as the heater button was not listed in any of the manuals. My neighbor bought a troy similar spec but didn't have the heated handles, gas drain
customer_reviews.author: Brian

customer_reviews.title: It Did Super in 19" Snow.
customer_reviews.text: Just recently got to use it clearing 19" of snow. Snow was a medium weight snow. Snow thrower did great!!! The tire tread is pretty aggressive, but on my steep driveway I'll probably be looking to add chains before long. Very Satisfied with the performance and features on this machine.
customer_reviews.author: Noknocks

customer_reviews.title: great buy
customer_reviews.text: Solid construction, love the warming handles and headlights.... and I am amazed how it cleaned up 3 inches of icy slush...
customer_reviews.author: Laura Faria

customer_reviews.title: Powerful. Really powerful. So powerful that it picked ...
customer_reviews.text: Powerful. Really powerful. So powerful that it picked up a pebble from the driveway, launched it towards my car and broke a window. Hahaa. My own stupidity.
customer_reviews.author: SYLWIA

customer_reviews.title: No extension cord supplied
customer_reviews.text: Fairly easy to assemble. Started on first pull. I haven't had an opportunity to use it on snow yet. Only negative I see so far is it didn't come with an extension cord for the electric start. I had to purchase a cord with a female end that fit into the male end on the snow blowers housing. Delivered exactly on the specified time and day. Delivery men put the crate right in my garage.
customer_reviews.author: Dom

customer_reviews.title: Very powerful and well designed
customer_reviews.text: Outstanding piece of machinery. well made and works great; I use it on 4-6 inches of snow and love the way it works. Very powerful and well designed tool I have cleaned my driveway which is 150 feet by 10 feet in just over 1 hour. Assembly is not difficult if you are follow the instructions.
customer_reviews.author: Victor Daniel

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: This has been a blessing this year at keeping our driveway clear.
customer_reviews.author: Rollo

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: had it during the blizzard in NYC. and what can i say ? what blizzard ?
customer_reviews.author: William Duong

customer_reviews.title: This thing will end winter
customer_reviews.text: Let talk about my new snow blower, well how do I start? I ordered this badass snow demon in late November and winter straight gave up. I’ve only been able to use it once in the past two and half months. I’m telling you, winter is living in fear of if my new snow demon, it won’t come out and play so sorry Winter Olympics game over maybe we can try again in four years. No I know what you are thinking...would I recommend this snow demon? Heck yes I would! But this damn thing! You will end winter! Anyway hope you find this helpful and sorry again about the Winter Olympics.
customer_reviews.author: william white

customer_reviews.title: Great quality machine
customer_reviews.text: Just received my new snow blower and it's pretty cool. It arrived within the 3 hour scheduled delivery timeframe. The shipping box was heavily damaged...looked like someone opened it. Thankfully everything was still inside. Assembly was simple, really just involves folding up the handle bars and attaching the directional tube. Took me about 15 min. Once it was ready, I added gas (already had oil in it) and plugged in the electric starter and wow, it actually started the first time! I bought this one to replace a similar size Yardmachine blower and the Husqvarna is considerable quieter. Love the bright orange color too.
customer_reviews.author: Al & Tina

customer_reviews.title: heavy duty for price
customer_reviews.text: Very cool looking easy to set up haven't used yet but started easy.
customer_reviews.author: Reg.Guy

customer_reviews.title: Fast shipping with Prime and a great price for the product
customer_reviews.text: Fast shipping with Prime and a great price for the product! Time will tell on how it works but am excited to try!
customer_reviews.author: Cortney Scott

customer_reviews.title: Great snow blower
customer_reviews.text: No snow yet but starts right up and seems very well made. Also unlike other snowblowers with the turning chute controls this one just has two levers to control the shoot with your free hand. I will update this once I get to try it out in the snow.
customer_reviews.author: Nathan Daggett

customer_reviews.title: I would not recommend this product to anyone
customer_reviews.text: I've received a defective unit, It worked for five minutes and would never start again. I would not recommend this product to anyone!
customer_reviews.author: Szilvia Kovacs-Kerbs

customer_reviews.title: plastic handle knob broken, front right side of the ...
customer_reviews.text: plastic handle knob broken,front right side of the snow thrower bend,not able to straighten ,the skid plate on the right side don't sit properly because of this bend.it is aggravating for a brand new product .
customer_reviews.author: bogdan110973

customer_reviews.title: Need some snow!
customer_reviews.text: Haven't used it yet because it hasn't snowed, but this is a well-designed machine from all my research. Materials appear to be high-quality. This one is fun because it has heated handle bars, electric start, and LED headlamps.
customer_reviews.author: J J

customer_reviews.title: It is a high maintenance price of machinery.
customer_reviews.text: It is a high maintenance price of machinery. Broke after the 3rd use and had to hire someone to tell me it was major issue with the transmission.... I am now adding to this. I went to get it fixed after 3 snow storms and this machine stopped working after the FIRST start in 2016. AMAZING I am so disappointed. I spend thousands of dollars with AMAZON and I am going to stop spending on big ticket items..... PLEASE HELP
customer_reviews.author: Shawn

customer_reviews.title: I'm glad to see they lowered the price by $64
customer_reviews.text: I'm glad to see they lowered the price by $64.00 since I bought mine a couple of weeks ago - I guess to match the other online dealers. Amazon will also charge state tax, unlike a couple of other reputable online sources, so in total I got to pay an extra $125.00. That's on me for not being very bright I reckon. Contacting Husqvarna is very difficult - go to their website and try to find a phone number or email address; Honda has both on their website, Husky just has a physical address in Charlotte. I needed to order a couple of small parts, what an ordeal. Hopefully the actual snow blowing part of the process will work well.
customer_reviews.author: Robert Loury Connell

customer_reviews.title: ... yet but the machine looks well build it was easy to assemble and very nice looking
customer_reviews.text: I didn't have a chance to use it yet but the machine looks well build it was easy to assemble and very nice looking. Just waiting for the snow
customer_reviews.author: Anonymous

product_meta.title: Husqvarna ST224 24-Inch 208cc Two Stage Electric Start Snow Blower
product_meta.description: Husqvarna ST224 has been developed for homeowners who need a high-performing snow blower to clear snow from large garage driveways & paths. It works regardless of surface type thanks to the adjustable skid shoes. Husqvarna ST224 has been designed for occasional use in all snow conditions. It has an efficient two-stage system with high throwing capacity. The handle has adjustable height for comfortable use. Friction-disc transmission ensures smooth operation. Features heated handle grips, LED headlights & electric starter for work in all weather conditions.
feature_bullets: Dimension: 58.5 x 40.5 x 24 inch (LXHXW) ; Weight: 198.6 lbs
